item.title: 最新消息丹尼尔-彭尼（Daniel Penny）是一名前海军陆战队员，他于去年 5 月在纽约地铁车厢内掐死了一名流浪汉。
item.description:
JUST IN: Daniel Penny, the former Marine who choked a homeless man to death last May on a New York City subway car, will stand trial beginning Oct. 8, a judge determined Wednesday. https://t.co/n6pvzCtAoe pic.twitter.com/673IEp7kgp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 丹尼尔-彭尼（Daniel Penny）是一名前海军陆战队员，今年 5 月在纽约地铁车厢内掐死了一名流浪汉。

item.title: 前尼克儿童频道制片人丹-施耐德（Dan Schneider）正在回应针对他的指控，这些指控在专题片《片场静悄悄》（Quiet on Set）中有所提及：儿童电视的黑暗面
item.description:
Former Nickelodeon producer Dan Schneider is responding to the allegations against him that were presented in the docuseries, "Quiet on Set: The Dark Side of Kids TV." https://t.co/7WnXMFdqer

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 召回警报：乔氏超市（Trader Joe's）在一份在线声明中宣布，由于可能受到沙门氏菌污染，该店将召回部分批次的少盐 50%烘烤和加盐全腰果。
item.description:
RECALL ALERT: Trader Joe's is recalling certain batches of its 50% Less Salt Roasted & Salted Whole Cashews due to potential salmonella contamination, the store announced in a statement online. https://t.co/Ig4qJqheTT pic.twitter.com/SZzRW7rLUL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 法国监管机构周三再次对谷歌处以罚款，这与谷歌向法国出版商支付新闻费用的长期纠纷有关。
item.description:
Regulators in France hit Google with another fine on Wednesday tied to a long-running dispute over payments to French publishers for their news. https://t.co/UXoDnf7TQH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 麦当劳新推出的一款经济实惠的快餐订单在 TikTok 上疯传，社交媒体对这款订单赞不绝口。
item.description:
Social media is eating up a new budget-friendly fast-food order from McDonald's that's gone viral on TikTok. https://t.co/9j38AJncpu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据报道，长期为王室成员提供治疗的私立医院伦敦诊所的工作人员今年早些时候试图窥探凯特王妃的医疗记录。
item.description:
A British privacy watchdog said Wednesday it is looking into a report that staff at the London Clinic, a private hospital that has long treated the royals, tried to snoop on Princess Kate's medical records while she was a patient there earlier this year. https://t.co/tTIaQEVlmN pic.twitter.com/9HY9ACl6fe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 本周早些时候，加利福尼亚州议会通过了一项法案，修改了金州的新法律，将快餐业工人的最低工资提高到每小时 20 美元，并于 4 月 1 日生效。以下是变更内容：
item.description:
Earlier this week, the California General Assembly passed a bill that alters the Golden State's new law raising the minimum wage for fast food workers to $20 an hour, which goes into effect on April 1.

Here's what's changed: https://t.co/2gHd81pwMT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 爱尔兰总理利奥-瓦拉德卡（Leo Varadkar）周三宣布，一旦选定继任者，他将在几周内下台，理由是 "个人和政治 "原因。
item.description:
Irish Prime Minister Leo Varadkar announced Wednesday that he will step down within weeks once a successor is chosen, citing "both personal and political" reasons. https://t.co/Pp4DaHved0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 法国斗牛犬连续第二年成为美国人最喜爱的犬种。根据美国养犬俱乐部（American Kennel Club）的数据，看看 2023 年最受欢迎的犬种：
item.description:
For the second year in a row, the French bulldog has claimed the top spot as the most favorite dog in America.

Take a look at the most popular dog breeds in 2023, according to the American Kennel Club: https://t.co/2olEy4qRZF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 但研究人员说，当我们了解这种疾病的原因或如何治疗时，我们仍然是 "隔靴搔痒"。
item.description:
Millions of Americans are still experiencing long COVID more than four years since the pandemic.

But researchers say we are still "scratching the surface" when it comes to our understanding of what causes the condition or how to treat it. https://t.co/9LgxGCmvwf pic.twitter.com/d55OkezFHE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 微型无人机在福岛核电站受损严重的反应堆深处拍摄的图像显示，控制设备被移位，材料变形，但仍有许多问题没有得到解答，凸显了核电站退役工作的艰巨性。
item.description:
Images taken by miniature drones deep inside a badly damaged reactor at the Fukushima nuclear plant show displaced control equipment and misshapen materials but leave many questions unanswered, underscoring the daunting task of decommissioning the plant. https://t.co/UXwbpRlzCW pic.twitter.com/BcCXOK3OjW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 周二晚，布鲁斯-斯普林斯汀和 E 街乐队（Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band）在菲尼克斯脚印中心重返舞台，为老大推迟的 2023 年世界巡回演唱会再次凯旋。
item.description:
Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band returned to the stage Tuesday evening at the Footprint Center in Phoenix in a triumphant reboot of the Boss’ postponed 2023 world tour. https://t.co/G5SUf21xmg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据美国海关和边境保护办公室称，在不到 48 小时的时间里，在一个美国入境口岸就截获了五起不同的涉嫌人口走私企图。
item.description:
Five separate alleged human smuggling attempts at a single port of entry into the U.S. have been intercepted in less than 48 hours, according to the U.S. Customs and Border Protection Office. https://t.co/6dBwnk8PWH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 新西兰表示将禁止一次性电子烟（或称吸管），并提高对向未成年人出售此类产品者的经济处罚。
item.description:
New Zealand says it will ban disposable e-cigarettes, or vapes, and raise financial penalties for those who sell such products to minors. https://t.co/5nplJ6XyU5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 阿富汗新学年伊始，塔利班禁止 100 多万女孩接受教育。

Afghanistan's school year starts without more than 1 million girls barred from education by Taliban. https://t.co/dZqUI8fmrq

item.title: 在这一天：1996 年，洛杉矶的一个陪审团判定埃里克-梅嫩德斯和莱尔-梅嫩德斯在用猎枪杀害其富有的父母一案中犯有一级谋杀罪。他们被判处终身监禁，不得假释。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 1996 a jury in Los Angeles convicted Erik and Lyle Menendez of first-degree murder in the shotgun slayings of their wealthy parents.

They were sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole. https://t.co/59acSWw78T pic.twitter.com/PtjyrsBIj5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 根据《2024 年世界幸福报告》，美国的排名下降了 8 位，不再是世界前 20 个最幸福的国家，落后于加拿大、以色列、科威特、立陶宛和阿拉伯联合酋长国等国。
item.description:
The United States has fallen eight spots and is no longer in the top 20 happiest countries in the world, falling behind countries like Canada, Israel, Kuwait, Lithuania and the United Arab Emirates, according to the 2024 World Happiness Report. https://t.co/mkyyt0HTVq pic.twitter.com/Jc2FxAtT9L

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国彩票机构表示，继本周二没有一张彩票中得大奖之后，预计周五开奖的 "兆彩 "头奖奖金将攀升至 9.77 亿美元。
item.description:
The Mega Millions jackpot is expected to climb to $977 Million for Friday's drawing, after no single ticket won the jackpot on Tuesday, the lottery said. https://t.co/167HWv2HbF pic.twitter.com/SSoQcbUTkJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：在没有头奖得主之后，下一次开奖的百万奖金将攀升至 9.77 亿美元。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 每年三月，佛罗里达最热门的海滩都会挤满来自全国各地的大学生，他们在春假期间尽情享受阳光、饮料和活力。
item.description:
Every March, Florida's hottest beach locations are filled with college students from across the country enjoying the sun, drinks and energy of spring break.

But this year, things are different. https://t.co/CmMJlxbfFc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国至少有两个州的立法者正在引用英国最近做出的一项限制年轻人性别转换的决定来支持他们自己的相关提案。
item.description:
Legislators in at least two U.S. states are citing a recent decision in England to restrict gender transitions for young people as support for their own related proposals.https://t.co/cjbEpSPQX5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 安塔-巴巴卡-恩戈姆（Anta Babacar Ngom）是一位 40 岁的企业高管，她为妇女和年轻人代言。她是十多年来塞内加尔第一位竞选总统的女性。
item.description:
Anta Babacar Ngom, a 40-year-old business executive, is a voice for both women and young people. And she's the first woman to run for president in Senegal in more than 10 years.https://t.co/4kO90XvdXG pic.twitter.com/X58rAPAheH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024
